Text.Name: LsXuanWu
Text.PossibleMagic.0.Desc: Black Tortoise absorbs nutrition from food more efficiently, converting impurities into Spirit Stones.
Text.PossibleMagic.1.Desc: Use on an ally character so that they won't need food, water or sleep for 3 days, but their movement will become slow.\n[color=#FF0000]Reach adulthood to unlock.[/color]
Text.PossibleMagic.2.Desc: Delays an ally character's Shapeshifting Tribulation at the cost of their lifespan.\n[color=#FF0000]Reach 50 Spirituality to unlock.[/color]
Text.PossibleMagic.3.Desc: Turns an area into Spirit Soil at the cost of their own growth and nutrition. However, water nearby will become normal water.\n[color=#FF0000]Reach 100 Qi to unlock.[/color]
